DOC.brief_summary: To compare the bio equivalence of new nicotine lozenge formulation with the reference nicotine lozenge so as to deliver the same nicotine blood profile.
DOC.criteria: Participants must be healthy smokers who usually smoked their first cigarette within 30 minutes of waking. Body Mass Index within the range 1927 kilograms/meters^2 Participants who used chewing tobacco or tobacco products other than cigarettes within 21 days of screening visit
